item.description:
Come join the fun at Boston's longest-running swing dance. The Boston Swing Dance Network has been running public swing dances with live music for over 20 years! The dances are held once a month at the St. James Armenian Church in Watertown.

http://www.bostonswin...

Lesson starts at 8:00pm

Performing on Dec 8th is the band "the Love Dogs"

This local seven-piece, high-energy band, combines elements of jump blues, New Orleans R&B and early rock'n'roll into their own powerhouse sound. http://www.thelovedog...

What the Critics Say: "The Love Dogs are funny, funky, and push a beat 50's style until you can't help but tap your feet. With big thick horns and humorous, sexy lyrics, this band is built for fun." - BLUES REVIEW

Admission is $13, which includes a beginners' lesson. The lesson begins at 8:00 pm. The band plays from 9:00 to midnight

The hall is air-conditioned and the dances are smoke and alcohol free.
Bring plenty of water to drink and comfortable shoes.
There are two parking lots and plenty of on-street parking.

Look forward to seeing you all there,
Karen A
item.name: Swing Dancing with the Love Dogs (includes lessons)
